select p.id,p.post_date,u.display_name,p.post_title,p.post_content,p.comment_count,tr.name,p.view_count,p.post_type from wp_posts p LEFT JOIN wp_users u ON u.id = p.post_author LEFT JOIN (select t.id,t.name,t.slug,ts.object_id from wp_terms t ,wp_term_taxonomy tt,wp_term_relationships ts where tt.taxonomy = 'category' and tt.term_id = t.id and ts.term_taxonomy_id = tt.term_taxonomy_id ) as tr ON tr.object_id = p.id WHERE tr.name IS NOT NULL AND p.post_type = '笔记' ORDER BY p.post_date DESC LIMIT 10;
